category.title: Category 4 - emergencies, roadblocks/emergencias, bloque calles
category.description: Report weather or traffic emergencies or road blocks.  Reporte emergencias de calle o clima o camino bloque

category.title: Category 2 - Fraud, selling stolen goods/fraude, vendir cosas robados

category.title: Category 1 - Robbery,, burglary/robo
category.description: Report a robbery or burglary.  Reporte un robo.
